description: JobStatus represents the current state of a Job.

active.description: The number of actively running pods.

completionTime.description: Time is a wrapper around time.Time which supports correct marshaling to YAML and JSON.  Wrappers are provided for many of the factory methods that the time package offers.

conditions.description: The latest available observations of an object's current state. More info: https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/workloads/controllers/jobs-run-to-completion/

items.description: JobCondition describes current state of a job.

lastProbeTime.description: Time is a wrapper around time.Time which supports correct marshaling to YAML and JSON.  Wrappers are provided for many of the factory methods that the time package offers.

lastTransitionTime.description: Time is a wrapper around time.Time which supports correct marshaling to YAML and JSON.  Wrappers are provided for many of the factory methods that the time package offers.

message.description: Human readable message indicating details about last transition.

reason.description: (brief) reason for the condition's last transition.

status.description: Status of the condition, one of True, False, Unknown.

type.description: Type of job condition, Complete or Failed.

failed.description: The number of pods which reached phase Failed.

startTime.description: Time is a wrapper around time.Time which supports correct marshaling to YAML and JSON.  Wrappers are provided for many of the factory methods that the time package offers.

succeeded.description: The number of pods which reached phase Succeeded.
